headline: Tesla stock sees 4th week of gains, Chipotle exec. to join board
summary: Electric vehicle manufacturer Tesla (TSLA) is adding Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG) President and Chief Strategy Officer Jack Hartung to its board, effective June 1, after Hartung retires from the fast-casual chain. Yahoo Finance senior autos reporter Pras Subramanian expands upon this news as Tesla sees its fourth straight week of stock gains — rising 44% over the past month — alongside waning sales numbers in China. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: Nvidia's China R&D center, oil prices climb: Trending Tickers
summary: Market Domination host Josh Lipton and Bullseye American Ingenuity Fund portfolio manager Adam Johnson go over some of the top trending stories of the day. Nvidia (NVDA) is in focus following reports from the Financial Times that the American chipmaker is reportedly building a research and development center in China. Oil prices (CL=F, BZ=F) rise as President Trump says the US is closer to a nuclear deal with Iran. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: Tesla adds Chiptole CEO to board, Vistra & gas, Berkshire's buys
summary: Yahoo Finance host Madison Mills tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including Tesla (TSLA) adding Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG) CEO Jack Hartung to its board, Vistra (VST) acquiring natural gas assets, and Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B, BRK-A) adjusting its positions in Citigroup (C), Constellation Brands (STZ), and Bank of America (BAC). Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Tesla Adds Chipotle Exec Jack Hartung To Board Amid Musk Pay Battle
summary: Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) disclosed on Friday that it had elected John R. (Jack) Hartung to the Board of Directors and the Audit Committee, effective June 1, 2025. Hartung is the president and chief strategy officer of Chipotle Mexican Grill (NYSE:CMG). He joined the company in 2002 and previously served as its CFO. Before Chipotle, he spent almost 20 years at McDonald’s Corp (NYSE:MCD). Also Read: Tesla’s Future Hinges On China FSD: Goldman Sachs Tesla stock is down 8% year-to-date as it grapple

headline: Tesla to add Chipotle executive Jack Hartung to board
summary: Hartung's addition will expand Tesla's board to nine members.  Joe Gebbia, the co-founder of Airbnb was the last addition to the board in 2022.  Tesla's board has come under scrutiny amid reports that it is exploring a potential replacement for CEO Elon Musk.
